app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Translator. Translate Voice
app_description: The translation is now quicker and easier than ever! The translator is the top performing translator app due to its ability to quickly and accurately translate text audio and photographs! Whether you re in a loud and crowded restaurant or need quick help navigating public transportation in a new place Translator is ready to come to your rescue. By offering both real time audio translation photo translation and quick audio conversation aid you will never feel challenged by a language barrier again. The Translator App features Over 100 languages with the ability to translate from voice to voice text to voice text to text voice to text or camera to text. This makes sure that you re protected in all situations including email conversation all audio and written text. Easily navigate and switch between different dialects as you travel Offline version of the app for instances without internet connection Gone are the days of sifting through a translation dictionary to navigate a new language. While the app is perfect for real time situations it is also a great learning tool for those who are looking to develop both their written and verbal language skills. The Translator is your new pocket translator to help you easily navigate any and all new situations with ease. Subscription The app contains the following subscriptions options: 1 Month 5.99 1 Year 39.99 Please note the subscription automatically renews unless auto renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period By using Translator you are agreeing to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: Private Policy http: gettranslatorapp.com privacy.html Terms of Use http: gettranslatorapp.com terms.html Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto renewal may be turned off by going to the user s Account Settings after purchase Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication where applicable
